Your role: As User Experience (UX) Research Co-op you will be working with our research team to learn about the needs, wants and behaviour of customers. You will work closely with a researcher and help them conduct qualitative and quantitative research to understand our customers' problems. As part of the research team, you will work with the business to understand their needs and collaborate with designers and developers to inform products based on data-driven insights. This role provides an excellent opportunity to help solve tough problems and create great experiences that have a significant impact on our customers. You will be working with a team that values critical thinking, creativity and professional growth. If you are curious about people and enjoy using data to understand behavior, this is a great opportunity to grow your skills.
